front.title: Secure Session Layer Services KMP via HIP

abstract.t: This memo addresses the need for secure, end-to-end communications from IoT devices to collectors, where the IoT devices many be too resource constrained for typical IETF solutions or may be deployed over non-IP networks (e.g. CAN FD, IEEE 802.15.6, serial SCADA). For such deployments, the Secure Session Layer Service [draft-hares- ssls-00] the needed, and sufficient features to ensure successful and safe communications.
